comments.commentBody:
It's also a way to conveniently communicate with Russia without calling them personally. Tweets like this give Russia and anyone else a heads-up to what Trump is attempting.

Brietbart articles like this will also convey information if you know what you are looking for.
The more sensational the tweet, the bigger the issue that he is hiding.
Have no fear: Paul Ryan and Mitch McConnell will never allow it.
He may be more dangerous than Trump as he is an ultraconservative idealogue.  We are doomed either way.

I think most Republicans, in their heart of hearts, are fine with abortions. In fact, I think they *like* Roe v Wade. Abortion is a wedge issue that gets voters to the polls. Unfortunately, such political strategy endangers the lives of such women. I am filled with sorrow to think that women are used as political pawns, not full human beings deserving of health care.

Republicans live in this fantasy world where teens do not have sex until marriage and therefore are not entitled to birth control or even basic gynecological care.  And they call themselves the party of values?  Give me a break.
Since when are abortion clinics about gynecological care?

No. He is a danger to all of us, encouraging us to give up our humanity and embrace hatred and meanness. There will be no colonizing space because he doesn't even want us to know more about our earth. He doesn't like knowledge because it shows up how small and mean and selfish he is, and he doesn't have any appreciation that his horizons are narrower than almost any human you could meet walking down the street.

We are capable of community and helping each other, but he wants us scared and violent behind closed doors, ready to shoot on sight. He has found the worst in us and that's what he needs to stay in power. Make no mistake, an empty inhuman is not good for anyone.
What would puzzle-makers do without Cheri Oteri?

It makes no sense for people who disapprove of abortion to make family planning services scarce. And it makes no sense to quibble about the cost of prevention, when the cost of disease, births, and children on welfare is so much higher.

So why are we in a bind on women's health clinics?

I can't help but think that people have convinced themselves that they are paying for women to be able to have sex. Like if we don't have the services, women will just stop.

Birth control is preventative care, just as pre-natal care is, just as routine check ups and flu shots are. Vaccines prevent illness and damage from disease; birth control prevents pregnancy and the risk that accompanies it; pre-natal care prevents birth defects and illness that can affect a child for his whole life.

What we cannot effectively prevent is sex itself. There are seven billion of us to prove it.

Michjas:

Thanks for your reasoned insights on this one.

I am clearly not as knowledgeable as you on this topic, but am also surprised that anyone is surprised, much less upset about this. It seems obvious that if the FBI was investigating Trump, they were probably using wiretaps to gather information.

We now know wire taps were sought by Obama  executive branch cronies that included alleged Trump contacts with Russian banks. These warrants had their genesis in Obama's Executive branch, by his surrogates, and no doubt with his silent imprimatur of approval. Clearly, no evidence was found because it would have leaked prior to the election.  Only a naive person would not lay that buck on Obama's desk. He may not have ordered it but he could have stopped it for sure. He did not. Now he wears this stain forever. This is right out of the Saul Alinsky playbook. This will forever tarnish Obama's already disgraceful legacy.

Naive? Heh. I'd said take a good look in the mirror. If one of the federal law enforcement agencies sought, and received, a judge's order to tap Trump's phones it was because they offered sufficient probable cause. Obama would have had as much to do with that as he did Comey's behavior, even though all would have occurred technically under the auspices of the Executive Branch. I find your verbal shot at our ex-president rather pathetic.
In one word: Nonsense.

Saul Alinsky wiretapping? Are you serious? Saul Alinsky was an honored community organizer. Are you sure you don't mean George Soros? Or Alex Baldwin? Or Beyonce? Anyway, you forgot to include links for your misstatement, so we won't know what white nationalist site originated this garbage. Let's ask #PRESIDENTBANNON!

President Obama didn't need to wiretap Trump Tower, a 400lb hacker in his mother's basement could probably have hacked through the unsecure Samsung phone he is using to tweet (and still uses to this day). Oh he is soooo Presidential.
Next come accusations of Clinton Voodoo, Witchcraft, and Time Travel... Actually, I should shut up, and not give Trump any more ideas.

There is a consistent pattern of deflecting blame, and then deflecting attention from his own failures- not enough votes fro winning the popular vote was blamed on illegal voters. The failure of the raid in Yemen was blamed on the generals, then uses the widow to redefine the relationship. Now the possible complicity in Russian hacking, is being blamed on Obama? Invoking watergate and McCarthy? Don't take the bait- the tweets are a decoy device, where there is smoke- there is fire.

This is the most absurd thing he's tweeted since the 5 million illegal votes that HRC received to win the popular vote.  No evidence there either, but he was going to have an investigation.  Whatever happened to that?
Multiple sources confirm Trump's phones still currently tapped.  Trump unaware of situation at this moment.  Details to follow.
At least we had 1 day to relax and to think, "Maybe, just maybe.............NAH!!!'

President Obama could not have ordered the "tapp" on the illiterate Trump's phone because he was born in Kenya.

It must be true because our so-called president says so.
Thank you. This made me literally laugh out loud.

OK, let's settle this sort of thing -- finally.  Trump has offered declarative statements (of fact) that place on him the necessity of evidence that leads to  proof of the accusation.  In the absence of evidence and proof, impeach.
The Russian ambassador to the U.N., and the Russian ambassador to Turkey have Ied recently, but not (as of this minute as far as I know) Ambassador to the USA from Russia, Mr. Kislyak.

Obama's history of illegally wiretapping is a given?

According to what verifiable evidence?

I look forward to your providing verifiable and credible sources for your claims.
If true, is this a big deal? Would this be a criminal act by Obama? Genuinely curious.
If true? When was the last time Trump said anything true?

The only way for Trump to have been wire tapped would have been if there had been a showing, with some evidence,  of Probable Cause of a Criminal Activity before a Judge would permit a wire tap. This allegation is completely bogus -- unless, unless ... there is evidence of criminal activity by Trump or his campaign people.

Most journalists and political commentators have been loath to employ the vernacular used by the average American to characterize the behavior of President Trump. Seldom do we hear the claim that the President “is lying” or that he is “unfit.” Instead we hear claims such as “the President appeared to misrepresent” or “the President may not have been aware” or the President “may have misunderstood.

President Trump has repeatedly made claims to the American public that are demonstrably false. It is time to realize that the use of such cautious and restrained language to describe his conduct minimizes the seriousness of the actual behaviors engaged in by President Trump.

Now President Trump claims President Obama “had my ‘wires tapped’ ” and he likened the claimed tapping to “Watergate/Nixon” and “McCarthyism.” It is time to use language which, in the eyes of the average American, accurately describes President Trump’s conduct.

President Trump “lies” to us, the American public. His unsubstantiated statements of an alleged wiretapping of him by President Obama are simply “sick.” All American’s can understand clearly, and without any doubt, what those words mean.
There is no substance to Trump besides the charade that he is important.
Trump's supporters need to be with him as he drowns in himself.  How about a long weekend for them all in Mar-a-log-oh? That's one way to kill a big bird and his flock at a gilt-lined resort.

Anyone who thinks that Hillary Clinton would govern worse than djt is blinded by unreasonable Hillary hatred.
The people who voted for djt own him; almost 3 million more Hillary voters agree that he was and is offensive!!
There may be a day in the not so distant future when it will be hard to find anyone who will admit to voting for him.
